H0.text: What was the name of the type of art particularly associated with Salvador Dali. Cubism

H1.text: What was the name of the type of art particularly associated with Salvador Dali. Abstract Expressionism

H2.text: What was the name of the type of art particularly associated with Salvador Dali. Futurism

H3.text: What was the name of the type of art particularly associated with Salvador Dali. Surealism

A4.text: He would be an influence on the two artists who would be even more closely associated with Surrealism in the public mind: Dalí and Magritte.

A5.text: Liquid shapes became the trademark of Dalí, particularly in his The Persistence of Memory.
